title: Procurement Officer Job at R & R Recruitment Services
content:
R & R Recruitment Services, a recruitment agency, training, consulting & human resources management company, is currently recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer
Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Hospitality

Job Summary


	We are looking for a detail-oriented and efficient Procurement Officer to manage purchasing activities for a hospitality business.
	The ideal candidate must be skilled in sourcing quality products, negotiating with vendors, and ensuring timely supply of goods.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Source and purchase quality items at competitive prices
	Maintain accurate records of purchases and supplier information
	Monitor inventory levels and restock supplies as needed
	Build and maintain strong relationships with vendors
	Ensure compliance with company procurement policies
	Collaborate with the kitchen and operations team to meet supply needs.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Procurement, Business Administration, or related field
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in procurement (preferably in hospitality)
	Strong negotiation and analytical skills
	Excellent communication and organizational abilities.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: r2recruitmentservices@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail .

Note: For more information WhatsApp: 09035411252.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Graphic Designer Job at Evans Industries




        
    

        
        Evans Industries is a manufacturing company, established over 20 years ago. Our purpose is to develop high quality home and personal care products at an affordable price. We are an ISO 90001 - 2015 certified company, therefore, all our operations comply with international standards. In admiration of the high quality products, Evans Industries products have become a household name and can be found across the country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Graphic Designer

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Purpose
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Graphics Manager is responsible for leading and supervising the creative team in developing high-quality visual designs for product packaging, brand materials, promotional content, and social media assets.
	The role ensures brand consistency across all platforms and supports the commercial team with compelling marketing visuals that reinforce the company’s identity and enhance market presence.


Key Responsibilities
Creative Direction & Team Leadership:


	Lead and mentor a team of graphic designers in producing high-impact visual assets for packaging, promotional campaigns, and digital platforms.
	Assign tasks, review artwork, and ensure design quality aligns with brand guidelines and marketing objectives.
	Conduct brainstorming sessions and provide feedback to drive creativity and continuous improvement.


Brand Identity & Consistency:


	Maintain and enforce visual brand standards across all communication materials.
	Ensure correct application of company logos, typography, and key imagery across departments and external partners.
	Collaborate with the product and marketing teams to develop cohesive brand narratives.


Packaging & Product Artwork Development:


	Oversee the end-to-end process of packaging design, artwork creation, and product mock-ups for personal care and household products.
	Review and approve print-ready files and collaborate with suppliers or printers to ensure production quality.


Marketing Support:


	Design and supervise the creation of marketing collateral such as posters, banners, brochures, in-store and outdoor promotional materials.
	Support digital marketing initiatives by ensuring timely development of engaging social media graphics and content layouts.


Project Management:


	Plan and manage design timelines, allocate resources, and ensure timely delivery of artwork.
	Coordinate with product development, sales, and marketing teams to prioritize requests and align outputs with commercial strategy.


Requirements
Education:


	Bachelor’s Degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, Visual Communication, Marketing Communications, or related field.


Experience:


	Minimum of 5 - 7 years of professional graphic design experience, preferably within FMCG, cosmetics, personal care, or household products industry.
	At least 2–3 years of supervisory or managerial experience leading a design or creative team.


Technical Skills:


	Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign), CorelDraw, and other relevant design tools.
